What features would you like to see in a: As a software developer, I appreciate apps that are easy to use and offer personalized insights. It would be great to have an app that automatically categorizes my spending and provides recommendations based on my habits. Additionally, I would like to be able to set custom budgets and track my progress over time. Mobile check deposit would also be a convenient feature.

How often do you use mobile banking serv: I use mobile banking services almost daily.

What would make you switch to a differen: I would switch to a different digital banking service if it offered better features, was more user-friendly, or had better customer service. Additionally, if a different credit union or bank offered a better interest rate on savings or lower fees, that could also be a reason for me to switch.

How important is it for you to have freq: As someone who values financial stability, it is important for me to have frequent engagement with my credit union through their mobile app. I would like to be able to easily track my spending, set savings goals, and receive personalized insights and recommendations. If a credit union's mobile app offers these features and encourages frequent engagement, I would be more likely to use it.

What concerns do you have about using a: As someone who values responsibility, my main concern about using a new digital banking service would be security. I would want to ensure that my personal and financial information is protected and that the app has strong security measures in place. Additionally, I would want to make sure that the app is reliable and that I can access my account information and complete transactions without any issues.

On a scale of 1-10, how likely are you t: As someone who is interested in managing my finances and achieving my financial goals, I would rate my likelihood of signing up for your new digital banking service as an 8 out of 10. The features you described, such as automatic categorization of spending, personalized insights, and easy-to-use goal-setting tools, are appealing to me. However, I would want to learn more about the security measures you have in place and how reliable the app is before signing up.

What could we do to make you more likely: To make me more likely to sign up for your new digital banking service, I would like to see more information about the security measures you have in place. This could include details about encryption, multi-factor authentication, and fraud protection. Additionally, I would like to see reviews from other users who have used the app and had positive experiences. Finally, if you offered any incentives such as a sign-up bonus or lower fees, that could also make me more likely to sign up.
